Key Match Events: Steph Curry scored 10 straight clutch points and 37 overall to hand the Warriors a 120-117 close win.
Klay Thompson scored 22 points, with 4 rebounds and 3 assists in his return to Golden State as a Dallas Maverick.
Klay Thompson hit 6 of 12 from the 3-point range and nearly handed the Mavericks the win after putting them up 115-110 with four minutes left.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson received a touching tribute from 400 Golden State Warriors employees and a standing ovation from the Chase Center crowd.
